imbalanced_transitions: However, due to recent planetary alignments, your energetic state has shifted — revealing an imbalance in the element of {current_element}.
While your core essence is rooted in {birth_element}, current cosmic movements have stirred an imbalance in {current_element}, inviting restoration.
Planetary influences now highlight an energetic disruption in the element of {current_element}, distinct from your native strengths.
Though you are naturally guided by {birth_element}, current astral tides suggest an imbalance in {current_element}.
balanced_transitions: Your birth and current energies both align under the element of {birth_element}, offering a unique opportunity to deepen and refine its qualities.
At this moment, your elemental balance mirrors your birth — the essence of {birth_element} seeks elevation, not correction.
This is a rare time where your soul’s original element, {birth_element}, remains steady — inviting conscious cultivation rather than redirection.
